formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'LOCK' =-
[Syntax] LOCK(<lockname>)
[Synopsis] Attempt to obtain a named mutex
[Description] Attempts to grab a named lock exclusively, and prevents other channels from obtaining the same lock. LOCK will wait for the lock to become available. Returns 1 if the lock was obtained or 0 on error.
Note: to avoid the possibility of a deadlock, LOCK will only attempt to obtain the lock for 3 seconds if the channel already has another lock.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
